00021 #include <iostream>

00030 // Vectors:
00031 
00032 double gfla_norme(double v1, double v2, double v3)
00033 {
00034   return sqrt(v1 * v1 + v2 * v2 + v3 * v3);
00035 }
00036 
00037 double gfla_normalize_3(double v[3])
00038 {
00039   double norme = sqrt(v[0] * v[0] + v[1] * v[1] + v[2] * v[2]);
00040 
00041   if (norme < 1e-10)
00042     return 0;
00043 
00044   double inv_norme = 1. / norme;
00045 
00046   v[0] *= inv_norme;
00047   v[1] *= inv_norme;
00048   v[2] *= inv_norme;
00049 
00050   return norme;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void gfla_scale_3(const double s, double v[3])
00054 {
00055   v[0] *= s;
00056   v[1] *= s;
00057   v[2] *= s;
00058 }
00059 
00060 void gfla_scale_3(const double s, const double v[3], double sv[3])
00061 {
00062   sv[0] = s * v[0];
00063   sv[1] = s * v[1];
00064   sv[2] = s * v[2];
00065 }
00066 
00067 void gfla_opp_3(double v[3])
00068 {
00069   v[0] = -v[0];
00070   v[1] = -v[1];
00071   v[2] = -v[2];
00072 }
00073 
00074 void gfla_add_3(const double u[3], const double v[3], double w[3])
00075 {
00076   w[0] = u[0] + v[0];
00077   w[1] = u[1] + v[1];
00078   w[2] = u[2] + v[2];
00079 }
00080 
00081 void gfla_sub_3(const double u[3], const double v[3], double w[3])
00082 {
00083   w[0] = u[0] - v[0];
00084   w[1] = u[1] - v[1];
00085   w[2] = u[2] - v[2];
00086 }
00087 
00088 void gfla_cross_product(const double v1[3], const double v2[3], double v1v2[3])
00089 {
00090   v1v2[0] = v1[1] * v2[2] - v1[2] * v2[1];
00091   v1v2[1] = v1[2] * v2[0] - v1[0] * v2[2];
00092   v1v2[2] = v1[0] * v2[1] - v1[1] * v2[0];
00093 }
00094 
00095 double gfla_dot_product(const double v1[3], const double v2[3])
00096 {
00097   return v1[0] * v2[0] + v1[1] * v2[1] + v1[2] * v2[2];
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 void gfla_copy_3(const double v[3], double copy[3])
00102 {
00103   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00104     copy[i] = v[i];
00105 }

00107 // Matrices:
00108 void gfla_copy_3x3(const double M[3][3], double copy[3][3])
00109 {
00110   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00111     for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00112       copy[i][j] = M[i][j];
00113 }
00114 
00115 void gfla_copy_3x4(const double M[3][4], double copy[3][4])
00116 {
00117   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00118     for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00119       copy[i][j] = M[i][j];
00120 }
00122 // Matrices:
00123 
00124 double gfla_det(const double M[3][3])
00125 { 
00126   return  M[0][0] * M[1][1] * M[2][2] -
00127           M[0][0] * M[1][2] * M[2][1] -
00128           M[1][0] * M[0][1] * M[2][2] +
00129           M[1][0] * M[0][2] * M[2][1] +
00130           M[2][0] * M[0][1] * M[1][2] -
00131           M[2][0] * M[0][2] * M[1][1]; 
00132 }
00133 
00134 double gfla_det(const double M11, const double M12,
00135                 const double M21, const double M22)
00136 {
00137   return M11 * M22 - M12 * M21;
00138 }
00139 
00140 double gfla_det(const double M11, const double M12, const double M13, 
00141                 const double M21, const double M22, const double M23, 
00142                 const double M31, const double M32, const double M33)
00143 {
00144   return  M11 * M22 * M33 - M11 * M23 * M32 -
00145           M21 * M12 * M33 + M21 * M13 * M32 +
00146           M31 * M12 * M23 - M31 * M13 * M22; 
00147 }
00148 
00149 void gfla_get_rotation_from_kappa(double R[3][3], const double kappa)
00150 {
00151   R[0][0] =  cos(kappa); R[0][1] = sin(kappa); R[0][2] = 0.;
00152   R[1][0] = -sin(kappa); R[1][1] = cos(kappa); R[1][2] = 0.;
00153   R[2][0] =          0.; R[2][1] =         0.; R[2][2] = 1.;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void gfla_get_rotation_from_phi(double R[3][3], const double phi)
00157 {
00158   R[0][0] =  cos(phi); R[0][1] = 0.; R[0][2] = -sin(phi);
00159   R[1][0] =        0.; R[1][1] = 1.; R[1][2] = 0.;
00160   R[2][0] =  sin(phi); R[2][1] = 0.; R[2][2] = cos(phi);
00161 }
00162 
00163 void gfla_get_rotation_from_omega(double R[3][3], const double omega)
00164 {
00165   R[0][0] =  1.; R[0][1] =          0.; R[0][2] = 0.;
00166   R[1][0] =  0.; R[1][1] =  cos(omega); R[1][2] = sin(omega);
00167   R[2][0] =  0.; R[2][1] = -sin(omega); R[2][2] = cos(omega);
00168 }
00169 
00173 void gfla_get_rotation_from_euler_angles(double R[3][3], const double omega, const double phi, const double kappa)
00174 {
00175    double 
00176      t1 = sin(omega),
00177      t2 = cos(phi),
00178      t4 = cos(omega),
00179      t6 = sin(kappa),
00180      t8 = cos(kappa),
00181      t10 = sin(phi),
00182      t11 = t1*t10,
00183      t15 = t4*t10;
00184    
00185    R[0][0] = t2*t8;
00186    R[0][1] = t4*t6+t11*t8;
00187    R[0][2] = t1*t6-t15*t8;
00188    R[1][0] = -t2*t6;
00189    R[1][1] = t4*t8-t11*t6;
00190    R[1][2] = t1*t8+t15*t6;
00191    R[2][0] = t10;
00192    R[2][1] = -t1*t2;
00193    R[2][2] = t4*t2;
00194 }
00195 
00196 int gfla_get_euler_angles_from_rotation(const double R[3][3], double * omega, double * phi, double * kappa)
00197 {
00198   if (fabs(R[2][2]) < 1e-6 && fabs(R[2][1]) < 1e-6)
00199   {
00200     /* Degenerate case:  When phi = +/- 90 degrees, then we cannot seperate omega and kappa */
00201     *omega = atan2(R[1][2], R[1][1]); 
00202     if (R[2][0] > 0.)
00203       *phi =  M_PI/2; 
00204     else 
00205       *phi = -M_PI/2 ;
00206     *kappa = 0.;
00207 
00208     return 0;
00209   }
00210   else
00211   {
00212     *omega = atan2(-R[2][1], R[2][2]);
00213     *phi   = atan2(R[2][0],  sqrt(R[0][0] * R[0][0] + R[1][0] * R[1][0]));
00214     *kappa = atan2(-R[1][0], R[0][0]);
00215 
00216     return 1;
00217   }
00218 }

00221 // Vectors/Matrices     
00222 
00223 void gfla_mul_scale_mat_3x3(double s, double M[3][3], double sM[3][3])
00224 {
00225   sM[0][0] = s * M[0][0]; sM[0][1] = s * M[0][1]; sM[0][2] = s * M[0][2];
00226   sM[1][0] = s * M[1][0]; sM[1][1] = s * M[1][1]; sM[1][2] = s * M[1][2];
00227   sM[2][0] = s * M[2][0]; sM[2][1] = s * M[2][1]; sM[2][2] = s * M[2][2];
00228 }
00229 
00230 void gfla_mul_mat_vect_3x3(const double M[3][3], const double v[3], double Mv[3])
00231 {
00232   if (v != Mv)
00233     {
00234       Mv[0] = M[0][0] * v[0] + M[0][1] * v[1] + M[0][2] * v[2];
00235       Mv[1] = M[1][0] * v[0] + M[1][1] * v[1] + M[1][2] * v[2];
00236       Mv[2] = M[2][0] * v[0] + M[2][1] * v[1] + M[2][2] * v[2];
00237     }
00238   else
00239     {
00240       double Mv_temp[3];
00241 
00242       Mv_temp[0] = M[0][0] * v[0] + M[0][1] * v[1] + M[0][2] * v[2];
00243       Mv_temp[1] = M[1][0] * v[0] + M[1][1] * v[1] + M[1][2] * v[2];
00244       Mv_temp[2] = M[2][0] * v[0] + M[2][1] * v[1] + M[2][2] * v[2];
00245 
00246       Mv[0] = Mv_temp[0];
00247       Mv[1] = Mv_temp[1];
00248       Mv[2] = Mv_temp[2];
00249     }
00250 }
00251 
00252 void gfla_mul_T_mat_vect_3x3(const double M[3][3], const double v[3], double tMv[3])
00253 {
00254   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00255   {
00256     tMv[i] = M[0][i] * v[0];
00257     for(int j = 1; j < 3; j++)
00258       tMv[i] += M[j][i] * v[j];
00259   }
00260 }
00261 
00262 void gfla_mul_mat_vect_3x4(const double M[3][4], const double v[3], double Mv[3])
00263 {
00264   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00265   {
00266     Mv[i] = M[i][0] * v[0];
00267     for(int j = 1; j < 4; j++)
00268       Mv[i] += M[i][j] * v[j];
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 void gfla_mul_mat_3x3x4(const double M[3][3], const double N[3][4], double MN[3][4])
00273 {
00274   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00275     for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00276     {
00277       MN[i][j] = 0.;
00278       for(int k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00279         MN[i][j] += M[i][k] * N[k][j];
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00284 // Inverse
00285 
00286 void gfla_inverse_3(double A[3][3], double invA[3][3])
00287 {
00288   double t1;
00289   double t11;
00290   double t13;
00291   double t14;
00292   double t15;
00293   double t17;
00294   double t18;
00295   double t2;
00296   double t20;
00297   double t21;
00298   double t23;
00299   double t26;
00300   double t4;
00301   double t5;
00302   double t8;
00303   double t9;
00304   {
00305     t1 = A[1][1];
00306     t2 = A[2][2];
00307     t4 = A[1][2];
00308     t5 = A[2][1];
00309     t8 = A[0][0];
00310 
00311     t9 = t8*t1;
00312     t11 = t8*t4;
00313     t13 = A[1][0];
00314     t14 = A[0][1];
00315     t15 = t13*t14;
00316     t17 = A[0][2];
00317     t18 = t13*t17;
00318     t20 = A[2][0];
00319     t21 = t20*t14;
00320     t23 = t20*t17;
00321     t26 = 1/(t9*t2-t11*t5-t15*t2+t18*t5+t21*t4-t23*t1);
00322     invA[0][0] = (t1*t2-t4*t5)*t26;
00323     invA[0][1] = -(t14*t2-t17*t5)*t26;
00324     invA[0][2] = -(-t14*t4+t17*t1)*t26;
00325     invA[1][0] = -(t13*t2-t4*t20)*t26;
00326     invA[1][1] = (t8*t2-t23)*t26;
00327     invA[1][2] = -(t11-t18)*t26;
00328     invA[2][0] = -(-t13*t5+t1*t20)*t26;
00329     invA[2][1] = -(t8*t5-t21)*t26;
00330     invA[2][2] = (t9-t15)*t26;
00331     return;
00332   }
00333 }

00338 void gfla_print_mat_3x3(ostream & o, double M[3][3])
00339 {
00340   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00341   {
00342     for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00343       o << M[i][j] << "\t";
00344     o << endl;
00345   }
00346 }

00348 void gfla_print_mat_3x4(ostream & o, double M[3][4])
00349 {
00350   for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00351   {
00352     for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00353       o << M[i][j] << "\t";
00354     o << endl;
00355   }
00356 }
00357 
00358 void gfla_print_mat_4x4(ostream & o, double * M)
00359 {
00360   for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00361   {
00362     for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00363       o << M[4 * i + j] << "\t";
00364     o << endl;
00365   }
00366 }
